subject: Steering Wheel Connection-Simsonn Manager-order #SSN389
description_text:
Good morning ,

I am from Argentina and 3 days ago i received my Steering Wheel but when y plug the USB to the PC, the Simsonn Manager dont
recognise the device in the app.

I will attach a screenshot.



[cid:524b0c10-6660-4ad1-ad89-8e001d29d7e6]

Thanks in advanced

Matias Romero

conversations.body_text: Hi Matias Romero,  Since the steering wheel does not require calibration and is not yet supported for display in SIMSONN Manager, you can go ahead and bind it directly in the game.

Ah ok perfect. The rotary at the sides are a press button too? because dont
work it.

El sáb, 13 de dic de 2025, 03:32, support@simsonn.com

Hi Matias Romero,  The 12-position knob on the lower right of the panel is used to control the function of the left knob. For example, when the left knob is rotated left or right, it corresponds to button 17 and button 18. If the right knob is rotated first, the output of the left knob will switch to button 19 and button 20. Please note that this feature needs to be tested in-game, as Windows can only display the first 32 buttons, while the game can correctly recognize and display all 40 buttons.
